checkNotice(String) - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.Controller
This method is used to make a request to the server and check if that member identified by his username appears in the database, so that he receives a notification (Alert) if any staff has sent it for lack of payment.
checkPayment() - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.MemberController
This method requests the server to verify the payments made by the member and if the member has made all the required payments the server removes the non-payment notifications.
